```{r}
library(OmnipathR)
library(decoupleR)
library(here) #must be with R version 4.3 and decoupleR version 2.6.0
```

# mouse prior
accessed 230525
```{r}
mouse_tri_complex <- get_collectri(organism='mouse', split_complexes=FALSE)
mouse_prior <- mouse_tri_complex %>%
  mutate(across(everything(), ~tools::toTitleCase(tolower(.))))
mouse_prior$mor <- as.numeric(mouse_prior$mor)
#write.csv(mouse_prior, here("data/processed/decoupleR_prior_CollecTRI/mouse_prior_tri.csv"), row.names = FALSE)
```
